entry.title: The Fox and the Wolves
entry.summary:
Author: Nathysama

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 46,118Chapters: 16/?Kudos: 55

Summary: In the coveted lands of Beacon Hills, a prized territory within Caeloria, magic is power—and its absence invites scorn. Stiles Stilinski, heir to an ancient house, bears the burden of being an inert: born without Arkanis, the magic that rules the realm. Ignored by his family and underestimated by enemies, he’s determined to protect the Stilinski legacy—even without the power others deem essential.With his grandfather leading amidst tense gatherings and his father missing under mysterious circumstances, Stiles is isolated and vulnerable. But the reclusive Hale family—feared for their near-feral strength—emerges as a potential ally. Together, wolves and foxes must face threats in the forests and the halls of nobility.Conspiracies and ancient magic place Beacon Hills at the center of a storm. Stiles must prove that even without Arkanis, a fox’s cunning can outmatch a kingdom of wolves.

entry.title: The Scent of Love (Original)
entry.summary:
Author: Zero_Nemad

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 38,371Chapters: 12/16Kudos: 45

Summary: Sheriff Stilinski decides to sent Stiles on a months long overseas trip. Because his son definitely needs a vacation and a little time out from Beacon Hills.Thanks to Derek, who lives in Venice, Italy, he also has a place to stay.Reluctantly, Stiles agrees to fly to Europe and encounters a somewhat changed Derek Hale.As they share an apartment, they begin to redefine their uneasy friendship and learn to trust each other.With lots of fun and flirty banter, both guys eventually get to know a whole new world of heartbreak, sex and true connection.(note to previous readers: I've changed and added a lot of dialogues, rewrite the sex scenes and the ending of the story will be different than in the first version from 2022/23.)

entry.title: Ghostest with the Mostest
entry.summary:
Author: all_the_words

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,702Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 7

Summary: This is just something that has been in my files for a long time, and I don't think that I'll ever finish it. So this is truly just a half fleshed out outline for a story that could have been. I mean, I could try to finish it if people like it. I just would need that motivation. The summary I came up with is as follows: Stiles thinks he's been able to see ghost since the nogitsune. It started when he noticed two ladies following Derek around, the problem is-- no one else sees them? Stiles decides not to say anything because he's alredy been the Beacon Hills freak of the week, je just wants wants to return to normal. So he tries, that is until the ladies notice that Stiles can see them. They begin to ask Stiles for minor favors, all for Derek-- and if Stiles wasn't in love before, he definitely is now. The ladies are ecstatic as they believe Derek may be in love with him too. Stiles isn't so sure. All the while, Derek and Stiles both try to deal with their grief. Only Stiles can help Derek with his, but it seems only Allison can help Stiles with his.

entry.title: Through the Water, Remember Me
entry.summary:
Author: beepdeephere

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,418Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 1

Summary: When Derek Hale invests in Jackson Whittemore crumbling family firm, neither expect the past to come crawling back with the tide. The town Stars Hollow--once quaint, always strange--begins to shift under their feet. Water runs colder. Shadows lengthen near the clock tower. And something ancient, something hungry, is waking beneath it all.As the pack reunites to help rebuild what's been lost, forgotten memories surface: old guilt, quiet longing, and the subtle pull between Derek and Stiles that everyone sees except them.Because saving a town means facing what they've buried--and remembering what the water took.

entry.title: The Wolf Who Touched Heaven
entry.summary:
Author: am0ra

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,422Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 18

Summary: Beacon Hills has always been a town where the impossible breathes a little too close. Among ancient forests and sounds that don’t belong to the wind, Derek Hale learned to sense when something isn’t what it seems. Ever since he met Stiles Stilinski, he’s known — without ever being able to explain — that there’s something in him not entirely human. But when a group of hunters invades the town and Stiles vanishes without a trace, Derek realizes his instinct may have been right all along. No scent. No trail. Only the hollow silence of an absence too sharp to endure. As the pack is torn between fury and desperation, old secrets begin to stir beneath the surface — and even Sheriff Stilinski seems to be hiding more than he should. Each step toward the truth draws them closer to something they can’t comprehend, something too ancient, too powerful, to belong to a simple human boy. And as Derek edges nearer to the line dividing the human from the unnameable, he understands that the truth about Stiles might not only change the course of the hunt — but everything he’s ever believed to be real.
